description.raw:
The default branch currently has 179 gcc warnings and 84 codecheck complaints on Ubuntu bionic:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-nvidia/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64-gpu-nvidia/1/

This branch reduces that to 16 warnings and 63 codecheck complaints:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=13)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/13/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/13/

The changes are organized by commit:

* remove unmatched cppcheck suppressions

* Mapshape.hh: use `%u` for unsigned ints in printf

* MainWindow_TEST: use iterator on only one data structure

* fix dangling-else compiler warnings

* use `[[fallthrough]]` attribute to silence implicit-fallthrough warnings

* increase some array sizes in ColladaExporter to fix format-truncation warnings (copied from ign-common3)

* msgs/GazeboGenerator: suppress unused-parameter warnings (copied from ign-msgs)

* DARTPhysics: add missing assignment operator to LinkPair class

* JointWrench: use rule of 0, remove unneeded assignment operator

This branch reduces that to 16 warnings and 63 codecheck complaints:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/13/

  • increase some array sizes in ColladaExporter to fix format-truncation warnings (copied from ign-common3)

  • msgs/GazeboGenerator: suppress unused-parameter warnings (copied from ign-msgs)

  • DARTPhysics: add missing assignment operator to LinkPair class

  • JointWrench: use rule of 0, remove unneeded assignment operator
